Reviews.Title: Be afraid
Reviews.Author: T. Bartman
Reviews.Content: I bought essentially the same TV from Costco two years ago.  The power source of the TV is failing, and now the TV only stays on for a few seconds before turning itself off.  Of course the warranty period expired right after we had moved and didn't have time to immediately file a complaint.  Searching the internet you will see this is a common problem with Sylvania TVs.  I have yet to get a good response from Sylvania.If you want to spend $400 for a TV that might last a year or two, go ahead and buy this.  Otherwise, keep looking.

ProductInfo.Features:
High-Definition LCD TV
2 HDMI; 1 rear 1 side
Adaptive 3D Y/C Comb Filter
Sleep Timer
Trilingual On Screen Display (English / Spanish / French)
ProductInfo.Name: Sylvania LD320SS2 32-Inch 720p TV Combo
